name: Superhero Cheesecake
tagline: Raising bar in digital for advertising agencies.
description: Superhero Cheesecake is an award winning creative digital production studio from Amsterdam consisting of UX designers, visual designers, developers and digital producers. We create premium digital work for web, mobile and installations. In recent years we have made name for ourselves with both small and large (international) projects. Superhero Cheesecake works with advertising agencies such as Achtung!, DDB & Tribal, JWT, TBWA\, FHV BBDO and Greenberry.
